TitleTraditionExcellence.comment: Title for tradition of excellence section

translation.content: Born from a meeting of friends united by their passion for Morocco, Riad Nashira stemmed from a shared dream: to offer an exceptional retreat in the heart of the Medina. In this haven where ancestral craftsmanship meets contemporary elegance, every space has been designed to awaken the senses and soothe the mind — from the spa to the pool, from local flavors to moments of tranquility.
Experience luxury in our Riad & Spa

At Riad Nashira & Spa, 17 intimate rooms, a sun terrace, three swimming pools (indoor and outdoor), two of which are heated, and two elegant restaurants create a true haven of tranquility. At the spa, enjoy the traditional hammam, personalized massages, and jacuzzi, while at the table, our chef celebrates local, seasonal produce, sometimes served under the stars for an unforgettable experience.

ButtonChooseRoom.comment: Button text for choosing a room

AltLuxurySuite.comment: Alt text for luxury suite image

translation.content: Explore our signature services and facilities.
Experience Luxury At Our Riad & Spa

Each corner of Riad Nashira tells a story of craftsmanship and elegance. Indulge in our world-class spa, savor authentic Moroccan cuisine, and relax in rooms that are a testament to refined comfort. Your journey into serenity begins here.

ButtonBookNow.comment: Text for book now button in CTA

translation.content: Luxurious Moroccan Riad interior with intricate zellige tilework, plush velvet seating, and warm ambient lighting, elegant style

ImageAlt.comment: Alt text for rooms introduction image

translation.content: Riad Nashira has 17 rooms and suites, each one different from the others. Conceived as unique worlds, they are distinguished by their color harmonies, plays of light, and the subtle dialogue between contemporary design and Moroccan craftsmanship.
Whether you choose a comfort room, a deluxe room, a suite or the exclusive suites, you will be immersed in a refined atmosphere, soothed by the calm of the riad and the elegance of its details.
Elegant restaurant setting with traditional Moroccan cuisine

ImageAlt.comment: Alt text for restaurant introduction image

translation.content: Our restaurant invites you on a culinary journey where Moroccan tradition meets contemporary creativity.
Each dish is a celebration of authentic flavors, prepared with carefully selected local ingredients.
Relaxing spa environment with traditional hammam

ImageAlt.comment: Alt text for spa introduction image

translation.content: Discover our spa, a sanctuary of well-being where ancestral hammam rituals blend with modern relaxation techniques.
Let yourself be transported by our signature treatments and rediscover the harmony of body and mind.
Modern conference room in luxury Moroccan hotel with elegant seating, audiovisual equipment, natural lighting, professional business setting

ImageAlt.comment: Alt text for events introduction image

translation.content: In the heart of the Medina, the Riad Nashira is much more than a place to stay where one can imagine organizing and experiencing unforgettable events.
Thanks to its refined spaces – patios, panoramic rooftops, restaurants, bars, lounges – our riad is suitable for all occasions, in an intimate and elegant atmosphere.
Our rooms are spread between the ground floor and the first floor, offering different views of our enchanting patios.

AmenitySpa.comment: Amenity label for spa and jacuzzi

AmenityPools.comment: Amenity label for pools and solarium

AmenityRestaurants.comment: Amenity label for restaurants and bars

translation.content: Our spa invites you on a unique sensory journey inspired by Moroccan traditions.
Between a traditional hammam, heated pools and a rooftop fitness center, our riad offers a total wellness experience, unique in the Medina.
Enjoy our three swimming pools to recharge your batteries in an exceptional setting.
A rooftop pool with panoramic views of the Medina, a heated indoor pool, and a pool in the heart of the patio. Oases of tranquility.
Organize your corporate events in an inspiring and refined setting. Our modular spaces adapt to all your professional needs.
State-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, personalized catering service and dedicated support for the success of your events.
Create intimate and refined moments for your guests. Our chefs design bespoke menus in exceptional private spaces.
Personalized service, tailor-made atmosphere and attention to the smallest details for memorable and exclusive evenings.
Weddings, birthdays, baptisms... Every important moment deserves a setting that lives up to your emotions and dreams.
Our team will assist you in creating unique events that reflect your personality and dearest wishes.
The ultimate experience: the entire Riad Nashira at your disposal. A rare privilege for exceptional events and absolute privacy.
All our spaces, services and teams are dedicated exclusively to your event for a tailor-made and unforgettable experience.
The heart of the riad, ideal for intimate ceremonies and cocktail parties.

translation.content: Experience pure adrenaline while exploring the spectacular landscapes of the Moroccan desert. An unforgettable off-road adventure.
Professional equipment provided, experienced guides and a circuit adapted to all levels for a safe experience.
Discover the most beautiful golf courses in Marrakech with breathtaking views of the Atlas Mountains. Excellence and refinement guaranteed.
Privileged access to prestigious clubs, top-of-the-range equipment and personalized service for an exceptional experience.
Explore the Agafay desert, spend a night under the stars and meet the nomads.
Sahara desert excursion with camels and Berber camp, golden sand dunes, traditional nomadic experience

translation.content: Refined simplicity and modern comfort in the heart of the Medina.
The perfect blend of spacious comfort and Moroccan charm.
Space, light and elegance for an exceptional stay.
Two exceptional suites: the Riner suite in homage to the judo champion, and the Nashira suite, the largest suite in the Riad.

RoomSpecialSuiteAmenity1.comment: First amenity for special suite room

RoomSpecialSuiteAmenity2.comment: Second amenity for special suite room

RoomSpecialSuiteAmenity3.comment: Third amenity for special suite room

RoomSpecialSuiteAmenity4.comment: Fourth amenity for special suite room

translation.content: A true paradise in the heart of the medina! Refined and authentic! The decor is elegant and sophisticated. The rooftop offers one of the most beautiful views of the medina and the Koutoubia Mosque. Sunset is a truly magical moment! The cuisine reflects the beauty of this magnificent place. After five visits to Marrakech, we wholeheartedly recommend this riad!

The rooms are absolutely stunning, very spacious, and recently renovated. The vibrant colors and decor are exceptional. The recently opened rooftop restaurant, Rive, is also a five-star establishment. The decor and service are impeccable. The cuisine is not only beautifully presented but also delicious, with a wide selection of dishes. We sampled the chef's lamb shank and the lamb chops, both incredibly tender and flavorful. The cocktails are also beautifully presented, with some original creations. We hope to return during our stay to admire the sunset.

What a spectacular place! The new Rive restaurant, located on the rooftop, is fantastic. The food and drinks were excellent, and the view was magnificent. The staff is extremely friendly, and the cocktails are delicious! I will definitely be back!

translation.content: Carousel of experiences at Riad Nashira

AriaLabelExperiences.comment: Aria label for the experiences carousel section

translation.content: Riad Nashira offers 17 elegantly designed rooms and suites in the heart of the Medina of Marrakech.
Each space blends traditional Moroccan charm with modern comfort. A luxurious retreat for an unforgettable stay, featuring authentic architecture and refined décor.
Between Le Nour, a Moroccan restaurant, and Le Rive, a Mediterranean restaurant, let yourself be seduced by two complementary culinary worlds.
Refined dishes, local and Mediterranean inspiration, and fresh ingredients for a unique culinary journey.
Enjoy our three swimming pools to recharge your batteries in an exceptional setting.
A rooftop pool with panoramic views of the Medina, a heated indoor pool, and a pool in the heart of the patio. Oases of tranquility.

Slide4Category.comment: Category for experience slide 4 - wellness and spa

translation.content: Our spa invites you on a unique sensory journey inspired by Moroccan traditions.
Between a traditional hammam, heated pools and a rooftop fitness center, our riad offers a total wellness experience, unique in the Medina.
Discover two bars and a panoramic terrace where refinement meets Moroccan tradition.
Authentic architecture, meticulous decoration and personalized service: each space has been designed to offer a unique and memorable experience in the heart of Marrakech.
17 unique rooms and suites, each with a singular atmosphere
Our rooms are distinguished by their unique color harmonies, their carefully studied plays of light, and the subtle dialogue between contemporary design and traditional Moroccan craftsmanship.
Close-up of a luxurious Moroccan bedroom detail, showing a carved wooden nightstand, elegant lamp, and rich textiles, moody lighting
Elegant Moroccan bedroom with a four-poster bed, dark wood paneling, and sophisticated decor, warm and intimate
Comfortable seating area in a Moroccan riad with colorful patterned cushions against a backdrop of intricate zellige tiles, vibrant and detailed
Refined simplicity and modern comfort in the heart of the Medina

translation.content: The riad has 3 comfortable bedrooms, located on the ground floor or the first floor. With a surface area of 25 to 30m², they offer an intimate and warm setting, combining colors and craftsmanship.
Perfect for a stay as a couple or solo, they combine authentic charm and functionality in an environment designed for your well-being and relaxation.

Perfect space for a romantic getaway or a personal retreat

translation.content: Ranging from 30 to 42 square meters, our Deluxe rooms combine generous comfort with authentic Moroccan charm. Finely carved woodwork, noble materials, and a warm color palette create a soothing atmosphere, ideal for relaxing after a day in the Medina. Every detail has been carefully considered to offer space, tranquility, and understated elegance, blending modernity with traditional craftsmanship.

Harmonious proportions, bespoke furnishings, and refined textures create a high-end haven where you can savor a true sense of freedom. Perfect for an extended stay, they combine privacy, contemporary comfort, and meticulous attention to detail.

translation.content: Ranging from 60 to 90 square meters, our Special Suites each bear a unique signature: the Riner, a tribute to one of the owners, a multiple judo champion, celebrates quiet strength and precise movements; the Nashira, the Riad's largest suite, unfolds into majestic, light-filled spaces. Both offer a rare experience, where understated luxury blends with the Moroccan spirit for an exceptional stay.

translation.content: The riad features 9 deluxe rooms, located on the ground floor or first floor. With generous dimensions, they offer a refined and spacious setting, combining sophisticated colors and exceptional craftsmanship.

Perfect for a couple's getaway or for those seeking more space, they combine authentic charm with modern functionality. Two of our deluxe rooms feature a small private terrace for moments of absolute privacy.

OtherRoomSpecialTitle.comment: Title for special suites room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Ranging from 60 to 90 square meters, our Special Suites each bear a unique signature: the Riner, a tribute to one of the owners, a multiple judo champion, celebrates quiet strength and precise movements; the Nashira, the Riad's largest suite, unfolds into majestic, light-filled spaces. Both offer a rare experience, where understated luxury blends with the Moroccan spirit for an exceptional stay.

OtherRoomSpecialDescription.comment: Description for special suites room in other rooms slider

OtherRoomCtaLabel.comment: CTA label for other rooms slider

HeroSubtitle.comment: Subtitle for special suites page hero section

HeroTitle.comment: Title for special suites page hero section

translation.content: Riad Nashira houses two exceptional suites, each telling a unique story. These exclusive spaces offer the ultimate in luxury and privacy, designed for the most discerning travelers seeking an authentic and refined experience.

The Riner Suite pays homage to a champion, while the Nashira Suite embodies the absolute excellence of our establishment. Discover these unique worlds where every detail has been carefully considered to create an unforgettable experience.
Cozy Moroccan comfort room with traditional tadelakt bathroom, warm earth tones, handcrafted details, intimate lighting.
Moroccan comfort room bedroom area with traditional bed, warm textiles, carved wood headboard, soft lighting, cozy atmosphere
Traditional Moroccan tadelakt bathroom with Italian shower, natural stone, warm lighting, luxury hotel amenities
Intimate seating area in Moroccan comfort room with traditional cushions, low table, warm ambiance, authentic decor

A vibrant tribute to one of the owners, a multiple judo champion. This unique suite combines sporting spirit with Moroccan elegance, creating an environment where strength and grace meet in perfect harmony.

RinerImageAlt.comment: Alt text for Riner suite image

RinerFeaturesTitle.comment: Title for Riner suite features section

translation.content: 65 m² of luxurious space with separate living room and private terrace of 15 m².
Unique judo-inspired decoration with authentic elements.
Private hammam and tadelakt bath for absolute relaxation.

The Riad's largest suite, the absolute embodiment of luxury and excellence. An exceptional space where the Moroccan art of living reaches its finest expression, offering an unforgettable presidential experience.

NashiraImageAlt.comment: Alt text for Nashira suite image

NashiraFeaturesTitle.comment: Title for Nashira suite features section

translation.content: 90 m² of sumptuous space with panoramic lounge and exceptional private terrace.
Refined decor combining ancestral Moroccan art and contemporary luxury.
Luxury private hammam and jacuzzi bath for ultimate well-being.

ActionBookNashira.comment: Text for book Nashira suite action button

translation.content: Experience something truly unique in our special suites. Every stay becomes an unforgettable memory in these exceptional worlds designed for the most discerning travelers.
Cozy Moroccan comfort room at golden hour, warm ambient lighting, traditional decor, inviting atmosphere, luxury hotel photography

OtherRoomComfortImageAlt.comment: Alt text for comfort room image in other rooms slider

OtherRoomComfortMeta.comment: Meta information for comfort room in other rooms slider

OtherRoomComfortTitle.comment: Title for comfort room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Ranging from 25 to 30 square meters, our Comfort rooms offer an intimate and welcoming setting, blending harmonious colors with Moroccan craftsmanship. Natural materials, soft lighting, and finely crafted woodwork create a soothing atmosphere, ideal for relaxing after a day in the Medina. Designed for well-being, they combine modern functionality (high-end bedding, clever storage solutions, tadelakt bathroom) with understated elegance for a truly relaxing stay.

OtherRoomComfortDescription.comment: Description for comfort room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Dark and moody interior of a premier Moroccan riad suite, with intricate latticework, plush armchairs, and atmospheric lighting, sophisticated style

OtherRoomDeluxeImageAlt.comment: Alt text for deluxe room image in other rooms slider

OtherRoomDeluxeMeta.comment: Meta information for deluxe room in other rooms slider

OtherRoomDeluxeTitle.comment: Title for deluxe room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Ranging from 30 to 42 square meters, our Deluxe rooms combine generous comfort with authentic Moroccan charm. Finely carved woodwork, noble materials, and a warm color palette create a soothing atmosphere, ideal for relaxing after a day in the Medina. Every detail has been carefully considered to offer space, tranquility, and understated elegance, blending modernity with traditional craftsmanship.

OtherRoomDeluxeDescription.comment: Description for deluxe room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Rooftop dining setup at a Moroccan riad at dusk, with candlelight, white tablecloth, and city views, romantic and exclusive

OtherRoomSuitesImageAlt.comment: Alt text for suites room image in other rooms slider

OtherRoomSuitesMeta.comment: Meta information for suites room in other rooms slider

OtherRoomSuitesTitle.comment: Title for suites room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Ranging from 45 to 60 square meters, our Suites prioritize space and light to enhance the elegance of the setting. Harmonious proportions, bespoke furnishings, and refined textures create a high-end haven where you can savor a true sense of freedom. Perfect for an extended stay, they combine privacy, contemporary comfort, and meticulous attention to detail.

OtherRoomSuitesDescription.comment: Description for suites room in other rooms slider

translation.content: Absolute luxury and exceptional refinement in the heart of the Medina

HeroSubtitle.comment: Subtitle for suites page hero section

HeroTitle.comment: Title for suites page hero section

translation.content: Riad Nashira offers five exceptional suites, combining generous space and refined décor. Ranging from 45 to 60 square meters, these prestigious accommodations feature a separate living room and high-end amenities.
Some have private terraces with panoramic views of the Medina, creating a private sanctuary where luxury and Moroccan authenticity meet harmoniously.
Cozy Moroccan comfort room with traditional tadelakt bathroom, warm earth tones, handcrafted details, intimate lighting.
Moroccan comfort room bedroom area with traditional bed, warm textiles, carved wood headboard, soft lighting, cozy atmosphere
Traditional Moroccan tadelakt bathroom with Italian shower, natural stone, warm lighting, luxury hotel amenities
Intimate seating area in Moroccan comfort room with traditional cushions, low table, warm ambiance, authentic decor

Our deluxe rooms embody the excellence of Moroccan hospitality. Each space reflects exceptional craftsmanship, combined with modern technologies to create an unparalleled stay experience in an exceptional setting.
Details hand-carved by the finest artisans in Marrakech
Authentic tadelakt, precious woods and silk textiles
Special attention to every detail of your stay
Intimate Moroccan comfort room showcasing traditional craftsmanship, warm color harmony, subtle lighting effects, authentic textiles, cozy atmosphere
Our deluxe rooms are perfectly suited to all types of stays, offering the perfect balance between Moroccan tradition and modern comfort.

HeroTitle.comment: Title for bars & restaurants hero section

translation.content: Two culinary destinations for a complete immersion in Moroccan and Mediterranean flavors.
Two distinct atmospheres, one same friendly spirit, to enjoy creative cocktails and unforgettable moments of relaxation.
Interior of a luxurious Moroccan restaurant with intricate tilework, hanging lanterns, plush seating, and a warm, inviting ambiance, authentic decor

RestaurantsNourCategory.comment: Category label for Nour Moroccan restaurant

translation.content: Nour restaurant pays homage to the richness of Moroccan cuisine. In a refined setting on the ground floor of the riad, enjoy delicately flavored tagines, generous couscous, crispy pastillas, or Moroccan desserts with subtle, sweet notes.

RestaurantsNourDescription1.comment: First paragraph for Nour restaurant description

translation.content: Local and seasonal produce is carefully prepared by our chef Abdel, for an experience that blends authenticity and elegance.

RestaurantsNourDescription2.comment: Second paragraph for Nour restaurant description

translation.content: Interior of a luxurious Moroccan restaurant with intricate tilework, hanging lanterns, plush seating, and a warm, inviting ambiance, authentic decor

RestaurantsNourImageAlt.comment: Alt text for Nour restaurant image

RestaurantsRiveCategory.comment: Category label for Rive Mediterranean restaurant

translation.content: With the Medina and the Koutoubia as a backdrop, each meal becomes an unforgettable experience, between heaven and earth.

RestaurantsRiveDescription1.comment: First paragraph for Rive restaurant description

translation.content: On the riad's rooftop, the RIVE restaurant invites you on a culinary journey between the two shores of the Mediterranean. It offers refined, light, and vibrant cuisine. Some dishes on the menu bear the mark of Michelin-starred chef Alexandre Lechêne, who has infused his expertise and creativity into the restaurant's culinary design.

RestaurantsRiveDescription2.comment: Second paragraph for Rive restaurant description

translation.content: Bright and airy Mediterranean restaurant interior with white and blue decor, fresh flowers on tables, large windows with natural light, and a coastal vibe

RestaurantsRiveImageAlt.comment: Alt text for Rive restaurant image

RestaurantsReservationText.comment: Label for reserve a table button

translation.content: A cozy and elegant retreat on the ground floor, ideal for an aperitif or digestif. Indulge in our classic cocktails and signature creations in an intimate atmosphere.
Cozy and sophisticated speakeasy bar with dark wood paneling, leather armchairs, a glowing bar with premium spirits, and intimate lighting, classic style

BarsRinlipImageAlt.comment: Alt text for Rinlip bar image

translation.content: The highlight of your evening. Enjoy a 360° view of Marrakech, live music, and a festive atmosphere. The perfect place to admire the sunset, cocktail in hand.
Stunning rooftop bar in Marrakech at sunset, with panoramic views of the Atlas mountains, stylish lounge furniture, infinity pool, and vibrant ambiance

translation.content: Take a little bit of the Nashira spirit home with you. Our boutique offers a selection of refined items: a mix of Moroccan crafts, textiles, Natus natural wellness products, Côté Bougie candles… unique souvenirs to give as gifts or to treat yourself…

ButtonReserveTreatment.comment: Label for reserve treatment button in spa CTA

translation.content: A moment of relaxation and balance at Riad Nashira and Spa.

FacilityTitle.comment: Title for spa facility showcase section

translation.content: The spa at Riad Nashira is a haven of peace dedicated to your well-being. Inspired by ancestral Moroccan beauty rituals, our space offers a unique holistic experience. Let yourself be enveloped by the warmth of the hammam, immerse yourself in our refreshing pools, and surrender to the expert hands of our therapists for a moment of pure bliss.

FacilitySubtitle.comment: Subtitle / description text for spa facility showcase section

translation.content: Riad Nashira offers a rarity in Marrakech: three swimming pools, two of which are heated and designed for different times of the day.
The rooftop pool, at the top of the riad, is perfect for relaxing in the sun and contemplating the Atlas Mountains and the Medina. It's also ideal for enjoying a cocktail.
The outdoor pool, nestled in a patio, is ideal for cooling off, swimming a few lengths, and enjoying the atmosphere of the riad.

PoolsFeatureIndoorTitle.comment: Title for indoor heated pool feature

translation.content: The heated indoor pool, a haven of well-being accessible all year round.

PoolsFeatureIndoorDescription.comment: Description for indoor heated pool feature

translation.content: Personalize your wellness experience with our personal coaching services and yoga sessions adapted to all levels.

SpaCategory.comment: Category label for main spa facility

translation.content: The Nashira spa is a sanctuary dedicated to rejuvenation. In a soft and soothing atmosphere, enjoy three massage cabins offering personalized treatments (relaxing, energizing, and signature argan oil massages). A relaxation area allows you to extend these moments of tranquility.
A "hairdresser" service is also available upon request.
Serene spa treatment room with massage table, natural stone walls, soft lighting, aromatherapy candles, peaceful ambiance
Immerse yourself in the age-old tradition of the Moroccan hammam. This purifying experience combines hot steam, black soap scrub, and rhassoul clay for complete skin regeneration.
Our two authentic hammams, built using traditional techniques, transport you into an ancestral purification ritual, followed by a moment of absolute relaxation.
Traditional Moroccan hammam interior with marble surfaces, steam, warm lighting, authentic architecture, spa luxury
A unique setting for your most beautiful moments.
